twice a day (from Latin ''bis in die'') |- | BDD || [[body dysmorphic disorder]] |- | BDI || [[Beck Depression Inventory]] |- | BE || [[Lower gastrointestinal series|barium enema]]

b.i.d.|| twice a day (from [[Latin]] ''bis in die'') |- | Bilat eq || bilaterally equal |- | BiPAP || bilevel [[positive airway pressure]] |- | BIS || [[Bispectral index]] |- | BiVAD || bilateral [[ventricular assist device]] (left and right) |- | BK || [[bradykinin]] |- | BKA || [[below-the-knee amputation]] |- | b/l || bilateral |- | BL || [[Burkitt's lymphoma]] |- | bl.cult|| [[blood culture]] |- | bld || [[blood]] |- | BLE || Bilateral Lower Extremity (in/on both legs). |- | BLS || [[basic life support]] |- | BM || [[bone marrow]]
